name: Unity 150 Project: Cylindrical Combat!!!
description:
This is just a short thing I made as a project for my Unity 150 class, and my first ever "game" that I've made!

...sorry about the physics bugs. Just consider the jank a feature?

You are a cylinder! A BLUE Cylinder! You must navigate your way to the finish line, beset by enemy red cylinders! Use the WASD keys or arrow keys to move your cylinder, and Q and E to rotate around. Your sword can delete enemies, and your shield can safely touch enemy swords without getting YOU deleted!
